nodes.text: Versimillipedes were a type of quadrupedal, brown-skinned reptile. In 0 BBY, a versimillipede climbed a rock face near to the Catacombs of Cadera, shortly before the area was decimated by the Death Star superweapon.

A versimillipede first appeared in the 2016 Anthology series film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. The species was named by Lucasfilm Story Group member Pablo Hidalgo during one of the film's visual effects review sessions. They were first identified in the video "Every Creature in the Star Wars Movies," which was released by the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel in 2019.
